channel.title: Github on Sc0rpi0n's Journey
channel.description: Recent content in Github on Sc0rpi0n's Journey

item.title: Week 2: A Tale of The Illusive Pull Request
item.description: In real open source, you have the right to control your own destiny. - Linus Torvalds Welcome everyone, this is your host Nikhil Maan aka Sc0rpi0n101 and this time we will talk about the Week 2 of the coding period for GSoC 2019 and the story of the elusive pull requests which people had to wait almost the whole week for. The Weekend after the Meeting
